Subject: Call for Papers: International Conference on Renewable Energy (ICRE 2026)

Dear Students and Faculty,

We are pleased to announce the Call for Papers for the International Conference on Renewable Energy (ICRE 2026), which will be held at the National Science Centre in New Delhi. This is a premier event for researchers and practitioners in the field. We invite you to submit your original research papers. The final date for submission is November 15, 2025. We look forward to your contributions.

Sincerely,
Organizing Committee<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>
